TopicTitle: Clipping Issue on Eve - Coordinates in Post

Articles.Content:
Hello, I seem to be having an issue after the 1.8 update with a clipping issue on Eve.  When I am walking around and start heading up-hill the Kerbol starts to sag into the terrain until it hits the point where the ground hits it's neck and it explodes.  If I jump it puts me back at the correct clipping on the visible ground.  Not sure if others have had this or not, so just wanted to mention it.  Coordinates this is happening at: Latitude: 6 degrees 47' 34" S x Longitude: 19 degrees 34' 52" E.

 

Here is a video clip of this happening:
